name: Compensatory Leave Request Approval Notification
response:
{% set leave_approver_email= frappe.db.get_list('Employee', filters={'employee_name': employee_name}, fields='leave_approver') %}

{% set leave_approver_name_dict = frappe.db.get_list('User', filters = {'email':leave_approver_email[0].leave_approver}, fields = 'full_name')%}

{% set leave_approver_name = leave_approver_name_dict[0].full_name %}


Dear {{leave_approver_name}},


Greetings of the day!


{{ employee_name }} has raised a compensatory leave request against From Date: {{ work_from_date }} - To End Date: {{ work_end_date }}.Kindly take the necessary action.


Thanks and regards,

HR-Team KoreCent
subject: Compensatory Leave Request Approval Notification

name: Compensatory Leave Request HR Approval Notification
